description:
An evolution on a MEC classic, the Logic II Sunglasses are designed for speed. The streamlined lens has an aggressive wrap, keeping UV and wind out of your eyes. Swap out lenses to match race-day conditions.

  • Interchangeable lenses allow you to customize your protection to the current conditions (additional lenses are sold separately)
  • Lens vents improve airflow, reducing the opportunities for fogging
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • Flexible, light and strong TR90 frame
  • 8-base curvature helps to protect you from light coming in at angles
  • Rubber temple tips and nose pads offer a comfortable fit that doesn’t shift
name: MEC Logic II Sunglasses - Unisex
